title: Apple Watermelon Lost Mary Tappo Prefilled Pods
description: Treat yourself to the delicious taste of the Lost Mary Tappo Apple Watermelon Pre-filled Replacement Pods ; a bright blend of crisp apple slices and fresh, juicy watermelon chunks. Each pack of Lost Mary Tappo Pods contains two pods that have been pre-filled with 2ml of 20mg (2%) nic salt e-liquid . The Lost Mary Tappo pod has been developed for exclusive use with the Tappo Pod Kit by Lost Mary . These Tappo replacement pods last for approximately 600 puffs each before they need to be replaced, making them a cheap alternative for those looking to stop using disposable vapes . The Lost Mary Tappo replacement pods are currently available in more than 25 different flavours , with each based on the same popular flavours as the best selling BM600 disposable vapes . Lost Mary Tappo Flavours: Apple Watermelon Banana Ice Blue Razz Blue Sour Raspberry Cherry Cola Cherry Ice Double Apple Grape Kiwi PassionFruit Guava Lemon Ice Lemon and Lime Maryturbo Mix Berries Peach Ice Pineapple Ice Pineapple PassionFruit Lemon Red Cherry Silky Tobacco Spearmint Strawberry Ice Strawberry Raspberry Triple Mango Tropical Fruit USA Mix Watermelon Lost Mary Tappo Pre-filled Replacement Pod Features: Flavour : Apple, Watermelon Pod Capacity : 2ml Nicotine Strength : 20mg (2%) Nicotine Type : Nicotine Salts TPD Compliant Prefilled Pods Compatible with Lost Mary Tappo Pod Kit Lost Mary Tappo Package Contains: 2x Lost Mary Tappo Apple Watermelon Pre-filled Replacement Pods
